properties.name: batch.run-timer.frequency-ms
properties.description: The frequency in milliseconds at which the batch run timer triggers.

properties.name: batch.run-timer.initial-delay-ms
properties.description: The initial delay in milliseconds before the batch run timer starts.

properties.name: batch.run-timer.schedule-window-seconds
properties.description: The schedule window in seconds for the batch run timer.

properties.name: thanlinardos.springenterpriselibrary.oauth2.client-certificate-path-format
properties.description: Defines the path format where to find client certificates for OAuth2 client authentication.
